mapper.select: SELECT sn.systemName,sn.picPath,sn.remark ,Case When allsn.systemName is null then 0 else 1 end as EnableSign FROM sys_operator as oper INNER JOIN sys_operatorlinkrole as oplr on oper.id = oplr.operatorId INNER JOIN sys_rolelinkpower as rlp on oplr.roleId = rlp.roleId INNER JOIN sys_grouplinkpower as glp on rlp.allPowerId = glp.formAllPowerID INNER JOIN sys_groupname as gn on gn.id = glp.groupid INNER JOIN sys_systemname as sn on sn.systemname = gn.systemname INNER JOIN sys_allpower as ap on ap.id = rlp.allPowerId Left Join sys_systemname as allsn on sn.systemname = allsn.systemname WHERE oper.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ap.stopSign = #{stopSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ap.powerType = #{powerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ap.formType = #{formType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY sn.systemname,sn.hellowWebName,sn.picPath ORDER BY sn.sortNo

SELECT sn.systemName ,Case WHEN sn.hellowWebName is not null AND LENGTH(ap.paraStr) > 0 then sn.hellowWebName else 'Default.html' end helloPage ,sn.picPath ,oper.name as operName,oper.departId ,gn.groupName,gn.isExpand as expandSign ,ap.caption ,case WHEN ap.paraStr is not null AND LENGTH(ap.paraStr) > 0 then CONCAT(ap.formPath,'/',ap.formName,ap.paraStr) else CONCAT(ap.formPath,'/',ap.formName) end as url ,ap.picPath as formPic ,ap.remark as formRemark FROM sys_operator as oper INNER JOIN sys_operatorlinkrole as oplr on oper.id = oplr.operatorId INNER JOIN sys_rolelinkpower as rlp on oplr.roleId = rlp.roleId INNER JOIN sys_grouplinkpower as glp on rlp.allPowerId = glp.formAllPowerID INNER JOIN sys_groupname as gn on gn.id = glp.groupid INNER JOIN sys_systemname as sn on sn.systemname = gn.systemname INNER JOIN sys_allpower as ap on ap.id = rlp.allPowerId WHERE oper.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ap.stopSign = #{stopSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ap.powerType = #{powerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ap.formType = #{formType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sn.systemName = #{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY gn.sortNo,glp.sortNo
